samples.context: The genes inherited from our parents decide whether we will be boys or girls. But so far, we have assumed that similar gene sets are inherited from both parents.
samples.question: What determines the sex of human beings genetically?

samples.context: Women have a perfect pair of sex chromosomes, both called X. But men have a mismatched pair in which one is a normal-sized X while the other is a short one called Y.
samples.question: What chromosome pair do women have?

samples.context: All children will inherit an X chromosome from their mother regardless of whether they are boys or girls. Thus, the sex of the children will be determined by what they inherit from their father.
samples.question: How is a child's sex determined in humans?
